effects.text: Roll an extra d20 and add it to the next attack roll.
You cast a random cantrip (GM chooses the spell) centered on yourself.
Your hair stands on end; you take a -1 penalty to Stealth checks for 1 hour.
A shower of harmless sparks falls from you for the next minute.
You gain resistance to fire for 1 minute.
You smell like rosemary for 24 hours. Advantage on any cooking checks.
A spectral shield appears and grants +1 AC for the next minute.
You teleport 5 feet in a random direction (must be unoccupied).
Your next spell is cast at one higher spell slot (no extra components).
You are frightened of the nearest creature for 1d4 rounds.
You glow with faerie light; shedding dim light in a 10-foot radius for 1 hour.
Your weapon turns into a harmless rubber chicken for 1 minute.
You gain 1d6 temporary hit points.
Your voice becomes comically high-pitched for 10 minutes.
You are covered in harmless flowers that last 24 hours.
All coins in your pockets are transformed into chocolate for 1 hour.
You can speak with animals for 10 minutes.
Your skin turns bright blue for 1d6 hours.
You emit a soft hum that grants allies within 10 feet +1 on saving throws for 1 minute.
You grow a small, useless tail for 24 hours.
A burst of confetti explodes from you; creatures within 5 feet are distracted (disadvantage on next attack).
Your eyes glow; you can see invisible creatures for 1 minute.
You become ethereal for one round (no interaction with physical objects).
Your hands turn into salamanders for 1 minute (cannot hold objects).
A tiny dragon (harmless) perches on your shoulder for 1 hour and sings.
You are compelled to dance for 1d4 rounds.
A random nearby object becomes sticky (like tar) for 10 minutes.
You cast Mage Hand, but it insists on writing compliments about you.
Your next spell has its verbal component replaced by a dramatic monologue.
You sprout harmless butterfly wings and can glide for 1 minute.
A soft breeze follows you, carrying the scent of the sea for 1 hour.
All food within 10 feet tastes like strawberries for 24 hours.
You gain advantage on the next Persuasion check, but disadvantage on the next Stealth check.
You briefly speak in rhymes for the next 10 minutes.
A small cloud rains politely on you for 1 minute (no damage).
Your hands can pass through solid wood for 1 minute.
You randomly teleport to a nearby spot you can see (GM decides) and giggle.
Your height is reduced by 6 inches for 24 hours.
All written text in 10 feet becomes slightly more legible for 1 hour.
You gain a temporary familiar in the form of a glowing moth for 24 hours.
Your shadow detaches and performs a short, silent play.
You smell like ozone; electronic devices within 5 feet behave oddly for 1 minute.
You are surrounded by illusory butterflies that gently distract foes (disadvantage on one attack roll).
A harmless clone of you appears and mirrors your gestures for 1 minute.
You learn one random cantrip for 24 hours.
Your voice echoes two seconds later for 10 minutes.
A random small trinket appears in your hand.
You gain the ability to breathe underwater for 1 hour.
Your next failed saving throw becomes a critical success instead (GM adjudicates).
The sky briefly shows constellations that tell a short story about you.
